full_summary:
**Title:** E6MON-23PQFL Period 01 - Standing Offer for Fresh Fruits and Vegetables
==============================================================

**Reference:** WS3971410438
**Publication Date:** April 28, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 5, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Procurement Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites eligible bidders to submit a standing offer for the acquisition of fresh fruits and vegetables. This notice is issued on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Correctional Service of Canada, and Department of National Defense.

**Scope of Work:** The standing offer is for the purchase of fresh fruits and vegetables located in Quebec, as detailed in Annex A. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM EDT on June 5, 2023. Bids submitted after this date and time will be considered non-responsive.

**Logistics:**

* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Regions of Opportunity: None specified
* Limited Tendering Reason: None

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to all eligible bidders who participate under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Bidder Information:**

Eligible bidders are invited to submit bids through the online platform. For more information, please visit the Ariba website: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16041949?extsite=MTYwNDE5NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16041949
